segments.text: The Phoenix team overpowered its counterpart 86 to 50 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're absolutely right to get a replacement for 21 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the Phoenix beats the Rocket , it will enter the final .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way , if it still has 21 .
segments.speaker: S2
